Description: Jobs from a specific user. Please only use your own BlazerID.
Jobs starting at a given time. See [Time formatting](#slurm-time-formatting).
Jobs ending at a given time. See [Time Formatting](#slurm-time-formatting).
Jobs with a given state. See [States](#slurm-states).
Show only the jobids supplied in a comma-separated list.
Show only the [Fields](#sacct-fields) supplied in a comma-separated list.
Output as delimited data with `--delimiter` if supplied, default is `|`.
Output as JSON. (Not yet available on Cheaha).
Output as YAML. (Not yet available on Cheaha).
Keep uniform units, e.g. all M instead of M and G. See [Units](#slurm-units).
